definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: Yanzhou Mining Group, Song, deputy secretary of Party Committee chaired the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 兖矿集团党委副书记宋国主持会议。

sentences.english: They decided to represent their urgent need to the District Party Committee.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定向区党委反映他们的迫切需要。

sentences.english: Jiang Xiaoli, Head of the Party Committee Steering Group of the district SASAC, attended and addressed the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 区国资委党委督导组组长江小丽出席会议并讲话。

sentences.english: Autonomous region party committee secretary Chen Jianguo presides over the conference.
sentences.chinese: 自治区党委书记陈建国主持会议。

sentences.english: Deputy party secretary of Shenzhen Airlines flights Liu accepted the award and delivered a speech Shenzhen Airlines brand.
sentences.chinese: 深航党委副书记刘航接受颁奖并发表深航品牌演说。

sentences.english: Chinese President Hu Jintao spoke with Hunan's Communist Party secretary by telephone.
sentences.chinese: 国家主席胡锦涛跟湖南省的党委书记进行了电话交谈。

sentences.english: The committee should encourage criticism and self-criticism among its members, and this should be made habitual.
sentences.chinese: 党委内部要开展批评和自我批评，要有这种风气。

sentences.english: Direct election was carried out in the Communist Party committees of 363 neighborhoods in Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 南京363个社区以公推直选方式选党委书记。

sentences.english: The third chapter the villages and towns party committee management chooses by acclamation the direct election reality to realize the way.
sentences.chinese: 第三章乡镇党委领导班子公推直选现实的实现途径。

sentences.english: The party secretary of the county began to pore on the problem of soil improvement.
sentences.chinese: 县党委书记开始考虑土壤改良问题。

sentences.english: Professor Du Zhichun current party secretary, the principal Professor He Qinhua.
sentences.chinese: 现任党委书记杜志淳教授，校长何勤华教授。

sentences.english: Soon letters and pledges of determination poured into the Party committee.
sentences.chinese: 大量的决心书很快就送到了党委会。

sentences.english: Gengyanfengs current director of the Taiyuan Tool Factory, deputy secretary of the party committee.
sentences.chinese: 邢岩峰同志现任太原工具厂厂长，党委副书记。

sentences.english: Should the leader of a school Party committee, for instance, be a professional?
sentences.chinese: 比如学校党委的领导同志，应不应该是个专业人员呢？

sentences.english: “Please believe the Mianzhu Party committee can resolve the issue, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “请相信绵竹党委能够解决这个问题”，他说。

sentences.english: Mr Li is Party secretary and major.
sentences.chinese: 李先生任党委书记兼市长。

definition: secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe

leading small group (LSG), a CCP body that exercises general oversight on matters relating to a specific area (LSG for foreign affairs 外事工作, LSG for comprehensively deepening reforms 全面深化改革 etc)/aka central leading group
United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)/abbr. for 統一戰線工作部|统一战线工作部[Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4]
CPPCC (Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference)/abbr. of 中國人民政治協商會議|中国人民政治协商会议[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4]
